name: Chef John's Raw Kale Salad
author: Chef John
summary: If you slice kale thin and toss it with other tasty treats like apple, persimmon, orange, and nuts, the kale mellows out and serves as a perfect foil for other vegetation.
ingredients: salt and ground black pepper to taste
2  orange, peeled and cut into segments (see footnote)
directions: Whisk vinegar, orange juice, Dijon mustard, orange zest, cumin, and red pepper flakes together in a bowl
Slowly pour olive oil into the orange juice mixture, whisking until thick and thoroughly combined
Season dressing with salt and black pepper
Remove stems from each leaf of kale
Stack 3 to 4 leaves of kale and roll together
Finely slice kale leaves crosswise to create thin ribbons
Combine sliced kale, persimmon, apple, orange, and pistachio nuts in a bowl
Add dressing and toss until well coated
